node.html:
• Started as an Android Engineer to build financing and insurance features for the mobile app
  • Moved to a backend team where I quickly learnt Scala and TypeScript and shipped multiple microservices
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms and frameworks
  • Developed and shipped many A/B tests using Optimizely
  • Experience working with AWS EC2, S3, SQS, Load balancer, SNS, Lambda, DynamoDB, FireHose
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and architects on a daily basis
  • Monitor services using DataDog, Kibana and Opsgenie
  • On call supports for the critical services
  • Collaborate with product managers for refining product stories and epics
  • Creating architecture diagrams using multiple tools
  • Experience working with OpenAPI (Swagger) Specification
  • DevOps related practices

frontmatter.title: Lead Android Developer
frontmatter.location: London, United Kingdom and Dubai, UAE

node.html:
• Developed and shipped highly interactive Android Application
  • Build library to add filters and emojs over a picture or a video
  • Messaging integration using PubNub which includes audio, video and file share features
  • Build and shipped realtime reaction feature over shared media
  • Single-handedly lead the Android development

• Built and shipped the McDonaldâ€™s customer feedback program RateYourVisit App for MEA region
  • Engineered and maintained major feature and roll out updates for the feedback app
  • Developed OCR technology for scanning receipt
  • Proposed and implemented a live video streaming app using Google Glasses
  • Developed and maintained code for in-house and client apps
  • Single-handedly lead the Android development
  • Architected and implemented mobile API in PHP

• Refactored and improved some part of the Cisco App
  • Worked on a proof of concept related to firebase notifications
  • Engineered and maintained new features for the Cisco Android app

• Developed and shipped Android application for BFSI domain
  • Engineered and maintained the apps for BFSI
  • Collaborated with a small team of Android and iOS developers
  • Developed and build a system using Gradle to dynamically generate Android APK with selected features
  • Architected and implemented Jasper reporting system using Talend ETL tool and Postgresql
  • Mentored and supported junior developers
  • Took technical interviews

• Developed and build physics based game engine
  • Built and shipped Cricket Game, Endless running, bejeweled type game and motion sensor tilt based physics game
  • Experience working with a Gaming studio
  • Used AndEngine and LibGdx for developing games
  • Worked closely with designers and management team to develop, document, and manage the mobile games

• First job after graduation
  • Self learned J2ME, Blackberry and Android SDK
  • Built and shipped apps and games on J2ME platform for symbian devices
  • Developed Games for Touch based Nokia phones using J2ME Canvas
  • Lead the Mobile development of freshers
  • Developed and maintained code for in-house and client apps
  • Worked closely with designers and management team to develop, document, and manage the mobile games and apps
  • Single-handedly built Android Apps for various clients
